forms.document_type: Generic PatientPop ROI authorization template (not Labette Health's own form)

access_pathway.primary_pathway_description: Patient submits an online Formstack form with electronic signature, selecting 'Patient/Self' as the release direction and relationship type.

red_flags: Formstack URL contains a typo in the subdomain ('labetteheatlh' instead of 'labettehealth'), creating link fragility
bright_spots: Fully digital workflow with electronic signature — no printing or mailing required
Email delivery option for receiving requested records
15+ specific record-type checkboxes guide patients through what's available
Photo ID upload for built-in identity verification
Sensitive information exclusion options (mental health, communicable diseases, drug/alcohol)

findability.rationale: Level 4: Easy to find with basic navigation — linked directly from the 'Patients & visitors' menu and the Contact Us page (2 clicks from homepage), though not discoverable via web search or direct URL due to bot blocking.

technical_accessibility.rationale: Level 5: Fully functional digital workflow — the Formstack form supports online completion, electronic signature, photo ID upload, and electronic submission with no printing or handwriting required.

content_design.rationale: Level 4: Well-organized with 15+ record-type checkboxes, clear sections, and structured fields; minor issues include the URL typo and lack of a PDF fallback for offline users.

patient_centeredness.rationale: Level 4: Patient access is clearly accommodated — 'Patient/Self' is an explicit option for both release direction and relationship fields, with email delivery and sensitive-info exclusions, though the form serves multiple purposes rather than being dedicated to patient self-access.

compliance.rationale: Level 4: Includes standard HIPAA authorization elements (1-year expiration, right to revoke, non-conditioning, re-disclosure warning); minor ambiguity in fee disclosure ('reasonable fee' mentioned in NPP but no specifics).

overall.summary: Labette Health offers a genuinely digital-first records request experience via Formstack with electronic signature and patient self-access clearly supported, earning above-average marks across all dimensions with minor gaps in findability and fee transparency.
